title: Lazer Zoo ~ Laser Tag NYC
desc: Laser Zoo The Wildest Sunday Day Party In New York City combining delicious food, strong drinks, world class DJS, and of cou rse LASER TAG!? Every Sunday the massive main floor of meatpacking's largest nightclub Highline Ballroom is transforming into your personal laser-tag arena! Our professionally designed LAZER ZOO will have your heart pounding as you race against the clock and your opponents for the highest score. The mezzanine is where the party is happening, enjoy great drinks and food while dancing the day away while overlooking your friends playing. ? Our world class DJ's will be on stage with all the sound, lighting, & CO2 you've come to expect at Highline. Curious about your score? It'll be displayed on the LED wall on stage So in the immortal words of Barney Stinson... Suit up! Get your team together & be sure to order your tickets in advance!? 21+ Proper ID Required // Tickets are non refundable
